nodes.text: Pace Freemaker was a friend of the B1-series battle droid R0-GR. At some point Pace mentioned to R0-GR that the droid L3-37 upgraded herself with protocol droid parts to pass from an astromech body to a bipedal one.
Pace first appeared in the series LEGO Star Wars: All-Stars, where he was voiced by Josh Peck. He was later canonized by the book Star Wars: Droidography.

Pace Freemaker was a male human mechanic from Corellia who was R0-GR's first master. He was the husband to Lena, father of Kordi, Zander and Rowan Freemaker, and paternal grandfather of Moxie Freemaker.
